long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bloons Tower Defense 4 is an exciting game that you can now enjoy as a Chrome Extension.

Bloons Tower Defense 4 is a classic tower defense game where the objective is to strategically place different tower types to pop incoming waves of balloons (called "Bloons") before they reach the end of the track. Players must carefully consider the placement and upgrades of their towers to effectively defend against increasingly challenging Bloon types and quantities. With a variety of tower options, upgrade paths, and game modes, Bloons Tower Defense 4 provides an engaging and addictive tower defense experience. The game can be played for free at the website https://unblockedgames6x.org/.
